pid_tuning.description: PID configuration table based on quadcopter total weight (in kilograms).

data.notes: Lighter frame – faster response, higher P, lower D to avoid overshoot.
Current setup – stable and smooth flight.
Heavier mass – slightly lower P, higher I, higher D for better control.
Heavier quad – slower response, needs more damping.
Heaviest setup – reduced P, higher D for stability, I increased for steady hover.
